instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165 no external display on thunderbolt
threads.message:
Hi,
i have this board without external display. it work well on the internal display, but my customer need to work on external display. No liquid, very clean board.
i have PP3V3_TBTLC = 1,1V, where is generated this power supply, on U1900?
thanks

threads.title: 820-00165 no external display on thunderbolt
threads.message:
PP3V3_TBTLC  comes out from U2800.

Do you get correct voltage at L3200?
TBT_A_HPD goes high (3V)?
If yes, check DP_TBTPA_HPD.
U3220 is a possible suspect...

threads.title: 820-00165 no external display on thunderbolt
threads.message:
Ok thanks
i change U3200, the problem is solved.
